additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Confectionery Ingredients: White Choc (55%) [Sugar, Vegetable Fats, Milk Solids, Emulsifiers ( Soy Lecithin, 476), Flavour], Raspberry Flavoured Lollies (45%) [Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Gelatine, Thickener (Modified Starch), Food Acid (Citric), Flavour, Colour (Carmine)], Glazing Agents (414, 904). Contains Milk and Soy. May Contain Peanuts and Tree Nuts.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Nuts, May Be Present Peanuts, Contains Milk
